name: Sniper Assassin New City
description:
Sniper Assassin New City will give you a realistic sniper shooting experience. As a true war hero & the best sniper assassin shooter it is necessary for you to ensure your survival & win by killing all the deadly criminals in this dangerous environment. The game has various missions to complete with increased difficulty at every stage.
Features:

* Ultra REALISTIC 3D graphics and cool animations
* HUNDREDS of thrilling MISSIONS
* Tons of letal GUNS and mortal WEAPONS
* ADDICTING gameplay (FPS)
* EASY and INTUITIVE controls
* Exciting car thief simulator.
